tool_description: Detect Language 📚, Sentiment 😁 and Tags 💡 from text with AI!
name: Sentiment & Language Detection (AI)
title: Sentiment & Language Detection (AI)

api_list.name: Detect Sentiment
api_list.description: Detects the general sentiment (negative, positive, neutral) from your text (max. 10 000 characters).  If you don't know in which language your text is written, use the **Detect Language** endpoint first.  Supported Languages: ['en', 'fr', 'eu', 'ca', 'es', 'nl', 'it', 'de', 'gl', 'da', 'fi', 'ru', 'pt', 'bn'].
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-language-detection-ai.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-language-detection-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: Detects the language from your text (max. 10 000 characters). The model is **a lot more accurate** with sentences of more than 10 words. Set the confidence to filter out low probabilities (1 is a perfect match). Support languages: ['en', 'it', 'fr', 'de', 'es', 'bg', 'zh', 'hr', 'cs', 'da', 'nl', 'et', 'fi', 'ka', 'el', 'he', 'hi', 'hu', 'is', 'ja', 'lv', 'no', 'pl', 'pt', 'ro', 'ru', 'sl', 'uk', 'tr'].

api_list.name: Detect Tags
api_list.description: Detects the most relevant tag for your text (max. 1950 characters). Support languages: ['en', 'fr', 'es', 'de', 'gr', 'bg', 'ru,' 'tk', 'ar', 'vt', 'th', 'zh', 'hi', 'sw', 'ur'].
